text: Seyfarth Shaw LLP ( ) is an international AmLaw 100 law firm based in Chicago, Illinois. It was founded in Chicago in 1945 by Henry Seyfarth, Lee Shaw, and Owen Fairweather. Seyfarth Shaw focused on labor and employment law at first. The firmâ€™s clients include over 300 of the Fortune 500 companies. ==References== Category:1940s establishments in Illinois Category:1945 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Chicago
